name: Planet Invaders (Gwydion-Meredydd)
description:
Planet Invaders is...

A strategy based action game where you take chart of an alien battlefleet and must destroy planets by taking down their defensive troops. The game  was inspired from the classic Space Invaders, however this time, we play from the perspective of the invading aliens! can you get to the last level and destroy earth?!  

Created By Gwydion LLyr Meredydd

*Disclaimer This Game was created for educational Purposes Only! Some third party assets were used and are listed on the document below. The Game does not mean to infringe or profit from these respected properties, only to use them for the University assignment.*
